column4: This field is for backward compatibility only.

This field can contain values for the patient's Social Security number of driver's license number.  Format: <ID>^^^<Assigning Authority>^<ID type>  Example: <Social Security Number>^^^USSA^SS~<License number>^^^<State>^DL

Used for patient validation purposes only. Prefix, suffix, and academic title are not stored, but values are verified during patient lookup. → Patient Name  → Prefix  → Suffix  → Academic Title  Format: <Last name>^<First name>^<Middle initials or names>^<Name suffix>^<Title>^<Academic degree>^<Name type>
Only date of birth is supported.
